title: What are the different philosophical perspectives about art? - Quora

response.answer_text: If the subject is art, then the perspectives on it, philosophical and otherwise, are countless. There are philosophies of art in general, what constitutes art, art’s function in society, art’s value in culture and in the context of an individual life. There are methodological approaches to criticism that engage with those larger philosophies. But there is no way to simply enumerate them all.
